resources.string:
Receive Android notifications in your browser. 
Instead of checking notifications directly on your phone, you can check them on your desktop while surfing the web. 

1.Get started by Singing up.

2.Install Notify Me! the companion browser extensions.
Enable Notify Me! in the settings and return to the setup.

Pair your computer by installing chrome companion browser extension. 
 1.Search Notify Me! in chrome extesnion.
 2.Login with one time Username and Password.
 3.That's all, once your phone recieves any SMS or Call 
 	 	 Notify Me! will post this as notification to chrome.
Instead of checking notifications directly on your phone, you can check them on your desktop while surfing the web.\nLets get started
